casebody.data:
MEDEDJI
v.
BONGOLO 29P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Ferdinand Ikende Bongolo, for Bongolo, Ferdinand Ikende. M. Rachael Dimont, Attorney at Law, Chad Archer, Attorney at Law, Francoise Mededji, for Mededji, Francoise.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of January 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
